front.title: Considerations with RTCWeb in Telecom Smart Pipe

abstract.t: Smart Pipe Service is telecom operator's opening of network capacities to ISPs, which can provide broadband speeding-up and QoS experience to end users. This document describes the mechanism to accelerate media stream transport in telecom operator's network of smart pipe for Real-Time Communication in WEB-browsers (WebRTC). Compared with packet mark on browser side, this mechanism focus on platform side.
